author: Marina Pitofsky
title: Florida reporter says she was blocked from Gov. DeSantis's coronavirus press briefing
description: A Florida reporter in a bureau operated by two of the state's largest newspapers says she was denied access to a press conference given by Gov. Ron DeSantis (R) on coronavirus efforts in the state.Mary Ellen Klas,...
